contribution_desc:
Suggests mobile device assemblies that are rings, bars, rectangles and radial shapes. Investigates their inter-device
interaction characteristics. Generative workshops on a game domain, user studies of the developed games to refine the characteristics. Interaction techniques to link devices depending on constellation.
